Reviews.Title: product delivered as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Navissa Kaiser
Reviews.Content: enjoying the long battery life and matt screen. great for writers. arrived packaged nicely and everything works so far. great product.

Reviews.Title: Best Laptop on the market.
Reviews.Author: G. Baim
Reviews.Content: Lenovo (IBM) Think Pads have always been the best made laptop. Innovations and reliability are first class. I would never consider any other laptop to purchase. The keyboard is excellent. This should be your "only choice."

ProductInfo.Name: ThinkPad T430s 23539MU 14" LED Notebook - Intel - Core i5 i5-3320M 2.6GHz - Black
